mapper.select: SELECT TOP (#{pageSize}) a.*,b.Name as deviceName,b.IP,b.Mac,c.Name as devicePosName FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER ( ORDER BY id DESC ) AS RowNumber,* FROM Ctrl_Event WHERE DeviceID =#{deviceID} ) AS A LEFT JOIN Device b on a.DeviceID=b.ID LEFT JOIN Device_Pos c on b.DevicePosID=c.ID WHERE RowNumber > #{pageSize} * ( #{pageNum}-1)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Ctrl_Event WHERE DeviceID =#{deviceID}
